import React from "react"; import styles from './Drawer.module.scss' import Info from './../Info/index' const Drawer = ({Count, onRemove,onClickClose, items = []}) => { const [isComplete, setIsComplete] = React.useState(false) const onClickOrder = () => { setIsComplete(true) } const priceCounter = () =>{} return(
{items.length < 1 ?
:

Корзина

{items.map((obj) =>(

{obj.title}

{obj.price} руб.
onRemove(obj.id)} className="cu-p" src="/img/btn-premove.svg" alt="remove"/>
))}
  • Итого:
    {Count} руб.
  • Налог 5%:
    {Count * 5/100} руб.
}
) } export default Drawer
